title: Out Of Range PROBLEM
body:
Help plss...
I tried all resolutions and still we are experiencing the same problem...

replies.body:
This isn't resolved if you use the windowed mode workaround? Try hitting **ALT+ENTER** once you leave champ select and start loading into the match.

Let me know if that worked for you!
I can only windowed mode to play, just so permits.

Yup, the issue only affects Full-Screen modes, so you'll need to play in Windowed Mode for now until the issue has been resolved for good.

If you have any questions, let me know.
Is it just me problem? Or do you?

It's a bug on our side that we've been looking to solve. We'll be releasing a full fix for it once we've found it.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
Once in windowed mode if you go to video settings and change to borderless u can play like its fullscreen just when u tab out it wont minimize.
I can only windowed mode to play, just so permits.
